specializations.name: UX/UI Design
specializations.description: Explore the principles of user experience and interface design. Learn tools like Figma and Adobe XD to create visually appealing and user-friendly applications.

specializations.name: Front-End Development
specializations.description: Learn the fundamentals of building responsive and dynamic websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Gain hands-on experience with modern frameworks like React and Angular.

specializations.name: Back-End Development
specializations.description: Understand server-side development, databases, and API integration. This course covers Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to build robust and scalable backend systems.

specializations.name: Quality Assurance (QA)
specializations.description: An introduction to software testing principles, covering test planning, automation, and quality assurance best practices. Learn tools like Selenium and JIRA for effective QA.

specializations.name: Data Science
specializations.description: An in-depth course on data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Covers essential tools such as Python, Pandas, and TensorFlow for real-world data projects.

specializations.name: Cloud Computing
specializations.description: Learn the fundamentals of cloud computing, including virtual machines, containers, and deployment strategies. Covers platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.
